module.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>missions`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>missions` ( `missionId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `creatorId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `workerId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `type` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL, `priority` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL, `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `dayStart` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `dayEnd` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `timeStart` varchar(5) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `timeEnd` varchar(5) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `content` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `location` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `reference` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`missionId`), KEY `priority` (`priority`), KEY `type` (`type`), KEY `creatorId` (`creatorId`,`workerId`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
